certifications.title: Certificate in Professional and Life Skills
Cyber Security Foundation Professional Certificate - CSFPC™

companies.name: Attentive.ai
companies.desc: Attentive.ai is the #1 landscape management software provider with end-to-end automation for all outdoor services business needs across landscape maintenance, construction, asphalt and paving maintenance, facilities maintenance, and snow removal.

companies.name: Masai School
companies.desc: Masai is an outcome-driven career school whose mission is to skill India’s untapped & underutilized talent and train them for some of the most in-demand jobs in the world.

experiences.title: Instructional Associate
experiences.desc: During my time at the company, my main responsibilities included:
bulletPoints: taking live coding and DSA curriculum doubt sessions for students on Zoom.
handling over 70 students on Slack, resolving their technical queries and doubts.
taking one-on-one pair programming sessions with students to help them develop their problem-solving skills
reviewing projects made by students and delivering lectures whenever required.
Overall, I played an active role in helping students understand and excel in the curriculum.

experiences.title: Student Guide
experiences.desc: Student Guide in Masai works with 10 students on average and thus they have the bandwidth to connect with students for their smallest of queries.

projects.title: AI-Image-Generator-DALL.E
projects.desc: This is a web application that generates original, realistic images and art from a short text description and allows users to download, share, or save them in their collections. It uses OpenAI APIs to generate the images and various technologies for implementation. The project comes with the following features:
bulletPoints: Generating Images with OpenAI APIs and Sharing Options.
Storing Images with Cloudinary.
Creating and Editing Collections.
Infinite Scrolling for User Posts.
User Registration and Login
Facebook and Google Authentication
OTP Verification for Email Verification
Changing User Profile Picture with Cloudinary
Refresh Tokens with Axios Interceptors and Cookies
Logout Feature with Redis
Reset Password Feature
Deactivating User Accounts
Deleting User Accounts

projects.title: Nobita Chatbot
projects.desc: Nobita(chatbot) is a ChatGPT playground that interacts in a conversational way. In this application:
bulletPoints: While generating the response, the User can stop the response. And then it can be regenerated again with the same button.
User can also copy the response after its generated.
Speech Recognition is implemented in the app.
User can toggle between Dark and light mode theme.
User can change the Model/Engine, Temperature, or Maximum Length to get different responses:
Model: The model parameter controls the engine used to generate the response. text-davinci-003 produces the best results.
Temperature: Higher values means the model will take more risks. Try 0.9 for more creative answers, and 0 for ones with a well-defined response. We generally recommend 0
MaximumLength: The maximum number of tokens to generate. The exact limit varies by model. 1 token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

projects.title: Ecommerce
projects.desc:
This app is designed to give you a full e-commerce experience with all the bells and whistles.
To get started, simply navigate to the homepage and browse through the collection of products. You can add items to your cart and proceed to checkout where you can enter your shipping and payment information. It accepts all major credit and debit cards through Stripe.
Overall, this e-commerce app is designed to provide a fast and secure shopping experience for users, making it easy for them to purchase products with ease.
It's is built using:
bulletPoints: React for the front-end
Redux for state management, which allows for efficient and centralized management of the app's state.
Material UI (mui) for the design and styling of the app, which provides a sleek and modern design that is easy to navigate
Stripe for secure and convenient payment processing.
The backend of the app is powered by Strapi, an open-source headless content management system, which allows us to easily manage and update our product catalog

projects.title: Amazon clone
projects.desc: This is an Amazon clone web application built using React and Styled Components, with Firebase as the backend.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.desc: Weather App that displays the weather wherever the user happened to be. I implemented the following user stories:
bulletPoints: Users can view the weather in his/her current location
Users can search for weather information of other places also
The weather icon will change depending on weather conditions
Weekly, daily, and hourly weather reports
Data on humidity, feels like, as well as the current time of location
Built-in map allowing users to monitor the weather in a particular region

projects.title: Kohl's Clone - Ecommerce
projects.desc: A collaborative project (Kohl's Clone - American department store) built by team of 4 members in 5 days. It is fully functional from the users signing in using their email and password, adding items to the basket, checking their basket, removing items if needed, and proceeding to checkout.
bulletPoints: Fully responsive design - You are no longer dependent on computers, you can quickly search for information using various devices: laptops, smartphones, tablets, and even smartwatches.

projects.title: GetCV - Resumonk Clone
projects.desc: This was my first web-based project in my final semester of college. During my project work, I learned things like HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. It was a great experience making a clone of Resumonk.
bulletPoints: Making Resume is a very hectic work for all students. Also, many companies judge the candidature of a student just by his/her Resume. So it is necessary for the student to think beyond the third dimension while making the Resume.
Resumonk(online resume builder) is the Web Application that helps students to get their resume in hand just by filling up a simple form where important credentials need to be filled in.
Fully responsive design - You are no longer dependent on computers, you can quickly search for information using various devices: laptops, smartphones, tablets, and even smartwatches

projects.title: SPM - Semester Process Management
projects.desc:
This is a standalone system designed to automate/reduce the effort and time of maintaining/retrieving data stored by using files and registers in the CSA Department of our college. The record of every student, course, and teacher was handled manually and there was no use of any computer.
This project contains mainly the following sections:
bulletPoints: STUDENT INFORMATION
STAFF INFORMATION
STUDENT RECORDS (ADD/MODIFY/DELETE)
STAFF RECORDS (ADD/MODIFY/DELETE)
ATTENDANCE RECORDS (ADD/MODIFY/DELETE)

JSProjects.title: LinkedIn AutoConnect chrome extension
JSProjects.desc: LinkedIn AutoConnect is a Chrome extension that automates the process of sending connection requests to a list of people in a LinkedIn search. This can save a lot of time for users who want to expand their network quickly and easily. For more details, please go through Github readme.

JSProjects.title: QR code Generator/Scanner
JSProjects.desc: This app is combination of both QR code Generator & Scanner, where User can enter a text or URL to generate a styled QR code for it. or scan a QR code by the camera. User can also upload or _Drag & Drop_ any QR code image, and decode or extract the content from it. And Finally User can download a QR code in 3 different formats - PNG/JPG/SVG.

JSProjects.title: Tic Tac Toe
JSProjects.desc: Tic-Tac-Toe is a game in which two players seek alternate turns to complete a row, a column, or a diagonal with either three O’s or three X’s drawn in the spaces of a grid of nine squares. For more details, please go through Github readme.

JSProjects.title: Image Resizer - Compressor
JSProjects.desc: User can upload an image and resize its width & height or reduce its quality(from 10%-100%) with slider. Also User can convert image from jpeg to png and vice versa. Finally user can download resized/converted/compressed images by single click.

JSProjects.title: Weather App
JSProjects.desc: Weather App that displays the weather wherever the user happened to be.

JSProjects.title: English Dictionary
JSProjects.desc: Type a word and get clear and simple definitions with example, pronunciation, synonyms and antonyms

JSProjects.title: Alarm Clock
JSProjects.desc: There is a digital clock that shows the current time along with alarm option. Users can select a time and set alarm for any time, whether AM or PM.

JSProjects.title: Flip a coin
JSProjects.desc: On flipping a coin, it produces head/tail with a cool 3D animation. It even maintains statistics about the heads and tails count. User can reset the status with the reset button.
